```{r}
f <- function(){
  return(rnorm(1,0,2)*(9/10)+rnorm(1, 10,3))
}

main <- function(){
  vals = c();
  
  for(i in 1:100000){
    a = f();
    vals = append(vals, a);
  }
  
  return(vals);
}

v=main()
hist(v)
nes <-median(v)+3*mad(v)

b <- c(abs(v)>=3*nes)

c <- which(b %in% nes)

```

```{r}
rand.Circle<-function(n,x0 = 0,y0 = 0,r){
  ro <- runif(n,0,r)
  phi <- runif(n,0,2*pi)
  
  x <- x0+ro*cos(phi)
  y <- y0+ro*sin(phi)
  
  return(cbind(x,y))
}

plot(rand.Circle(1000000,0,0,1))
```
